title: Concluding game screen takes a minute to load
body: This happens to me EVERY GAME.  And its not interent.  My brother plays with me on the same wifi and he gets in in like 1 second after game ends.  I have to wait a full minute.  Help?

replies.body: YOu might have the option "close client during game" turned on. Go into your client options and double check for that, since if it's on it exits the client while a game is going. Since it's closed, it needs to reopen each time. Should be a simple fix!
